use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code 
AS 
select rate_code_id,rate_code
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b')
        with  
            (
            jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as rate_data
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with(
            rate_code_id SMALLINT,
            rate_code VARCHAR(25)
            )
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_payment_type
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_payment_type 
AS 
select payment_type,payment_type_desc
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with
        (
            payment_type SMALLINT,
            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(25)
        ) as payment_type_detail

GO

select * from bronze.vw_rate_code

SELECT * from bronze.vw_payment_type
